info.name: User Settings
info.description: These app give the admin the possibility to set the visibility of userdata. The visibility of Avatar, Displayname, Email address, Phone number, Address, Website and Twitter account, can seperatly set to private, contacts or public. These settings will be automatical aktivated at the first login of the user. You can find this settings in the security categorie of the administration settings.
info.author: Michelle Mederake
